keyFacts: A civil lawsuit titled CMA v. JE/SK was filed, with Jeffrey Epstein (JE) and likely Sarah Kellen (SK) as defendants.
The case involved a summons and complaint filed on February 25, 2008, and a first amended complaint filed on February 9, 2009.
An affidavit from Dr. Hall was submitted as part of the case materials.
Numerous 3500 materials (likely discovery documents under Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 16 or Jencks Act materials) were produced for review.
The document is an index or list of materials provided for review in the legal proceedings.
